column4: How safe is it to use internet while installing a fresh Ubuntu??????? Can the info be hijacked and a malicious program get in????
Excuse meeeeeee!!!!! How safe is it to install Ubuntu with all option checked meaning install with internet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
OMG thanks so much ActionParsnip. lol!
It can be safe, as long as you have a stable internet connection(wont cut off on you). And please cut down on the number of exclamation marks you are using.
